SEARCH
Package Model

Class Student

java.lang.Object
Model.Student
public class Student extends Object
The Student class represents a student with a unique ID, name, surname, and a list of grades. It provides methods to manage the student's data, including adding and removing grades.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrian Reszka

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(String name, String surname, int id)
      Constructs a new Student object with the specified name, surname, and ID. Initializes an empty list of grades.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the student
      surname - the surname of the student
      id - the unique identifier of the student

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the student's ID.
      Returns:
      the student's ID

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the student's name.
      Returns:
      the student's name

    • getSurname

      public String getSurname()
      Gets the student's surname.
      Returns:
      the student's surname

    • setId

      public void setId(int id)
      Sets the student's ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the new ID for the student

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the student's name.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name for the student

    • setSurname

      public void setSurname(String surname)
      Sets the student's surname.
      Parameters:
      surname - the new surname for the student

    • addGrade

      public void addGrade(double value, String teacher, String subject)
      Adds a grade to the student's list of grades.
      Parameters:
      value - the value of the grade
      teacher - the name of the teacher who gave the grade
      subject - the subject for which the grade was given

    • removeGrade

      public boolean removeGrade(int index)
      Removes a grade from the student's list of grades based on the index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the grade to remove
      Returns:
      true if the grade was successfully removed, false if the index is invalid

    • printGrades

      public void printGrades()
      Prints all the student's grades in a readable format. If the student has no grades, a message is displayed indicating this.

    • getGrades

      public ArrayList<Grade> getGrades()
      Gets the list of grades assigned to the student.
      Returns:
      the list of grades
